long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Toppings is your ultimate toolkit to customize and enhance YouTube. From tracking playlist runtimes to fine-tuning playback speeds, it’s designed to give you the power to make YouTube work for you, not the other way around.  

What’s Inside?
- 🕒 Playlist Insights: See exactly how much time you’ll need to conquer that playlist.  
- 🎛️ Custom Playback Controls: Set playback speeds and seek durations to the exact second.  
- 🎥 Auto-Scroll Shorts: Keep the Shorts flowing without lifting a finger.  
- 🎹 Custom Keybindings: Streamline your workflow with personalized shortcuts.  
- 🛡️ Privacy You Can Trust: No data collection, period.  

Whether you're a casual viewer or a power user, Toppings lets you fine-tune YouTube your way.  
--- 
**Note**: Toppings is a third-party extension and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Chrome.

Visit our official website for more information: (https://enrych.github.io/toppings)
